content: row 15 k12 sm *k3 p1 k8 p1 k3 repeat from * to m sm k12 row 16 k12 sm *p3 k1 p2 k4 p2 k1 p3 repeat from * to m sm k12 row 17 k12 sm *k3 p1 k8 p1 k3 repeat from * to m sm k12 row 18 k12 sm *p3 k1 p8 k1 p3 repeat from * to m sm k12 row 19 k12 sm *k3 p1 k8 p1 k3 repeat from * to m sm k12 row 20 k12 sm *p3 k1 p8 k1 p3 repeat from * to m sm k12 row 21 k12 sm *k3 p1 c4f c4b p1 k3 repeat from * to m sm k12 row 22 k12 sm *p3 k1 p8 k1 p3 repeat from * to m sm k12 row 23 k12 sm *k3 p1 k8 p1 k3 repeat from * to m sm k12 row 24 k12 sm *p3 k1 p8 k1 p3 repeat from * to m sm k12 row 25 k12 sm *k3 p1 c4f c4b p1 k3 repeat from * to m sm k12 #sleepyowlsbabyblanket 8 of 14 marie-elyse dugal designs row 26 k12 sm knit to m sm k12 reverse leaves section chart on p14 row 27 k12 sm purl to m sm k12 row 28 k12 sm purl to m sm k12 row 29 k12 sm knit to m sm k12 row 30 k12 sm purl to m sm k12 row 31 k12 sm k3 p4 *k4 p4 repeat from * to last st before m k1 sm k12 row 32 k12 sm p2 k4 *p4 k4 repeat from * to last 2 sts before m p2 sm k12 row 33 k12 sm k1 p4 *k4 p4 repeat from * to last 3 sts before m k3 sm k12 row 34 k12 sm *p4 k4 repeat from * to m sm k12 row 35 k12 sm *k4 p4 repeat from *to m sm k12 row 36 k12 sm k3 p4 *k4 p4 repeat from * to last st before m k1 sm k12 row 37 k12 sm p2 k4 *p4 k4 repeat from * to last 2 sts before m p2 sm k12 row 38 k12 sm k1 p4 *k4 p4 repeat from * to last 3 sts before m k3 sm k12 #sleepyowlsbabyblanket 9 of 14 marie-elyse dugal designs row 39 k12 sm knit to m sm k12 row 40 k12 sm purl to m sm k12 row 41 k12 sm knit to m sm k12 row 42 k12 sm purl to m sm k12 garter border not charted row 43-58 knit to end removing markers as you come to them on row 43 the first row of this section cast off loosely i suggest just a simple knit bind off being careful not to tug on your yarn but if you are a tight knitter you may want to use a stretchier method such as jenny s surprisingly stretchy bind off soak in cold water with wool wash and block
